content: It’s been awhile, but I thought that was my Union Station! Many wonderful memories of going to and fro to college — even with the time my train crashed. :-O And Garretts? Evilness that tastes like heaven! Have to stop there every time I go home. I didn’t like living in Chicago for various reasons, but I do love to visit and in 100-word snippets is good, too. Thanks Gail!
